thread.title: Gorillaz Drops New Mix From Noodle
thread.title_full: Gorillaz Drops New Mix From Noodle

author: Hypebeast (info@hypebeast.com)
title: Gorillaz Drops New Mix From Noodle
text:
Everyone's favorite British virtual band Gorillaz has been making a steady comeback with the release of a biographical series titled The Book of 2D and the promise of a new album in the near future. Last month, animated band member Murdoc released a Christmas playlist. Today, Gorillaz bassist Noodle posted a new mix on Soundcloud honoring female artists past and present. "In search of new sounds and new inspiration, I found these kick-ass women who in their own individual ways are true pioneers in the writing, production and creation of MUSIC. They have inspired me and I hope they inspire you too." The mix features music from Grimes, Empress Of, Kali Uchis , Anna Meredith, Abra, Mica Levi & Oliver Coates, Fatima Al Qadiri and more. The songs are intersected by clips of interviews with the late electronic music composer Delia Derbyshire, who is the mastermind behind the Doctor Who opening theme (the finale of the mix), as well as with deaf percussionist Evelyn Glennie. Take a listen to the mix and share your thoughts in the comments below.

In search of new sounds and new inspiration, I found these kick-ass women who in their own individual ways are true pioneers in the writing, production and creation of MUSIC. They have inspired me, and I hope they inspire you too. www.soundcloud.com/ gorillaz /noodle ✌???? Ake Ome❗❗ あけおめ❗ 
A photo posted by 私 Noodle ❗️???? (@ watashiwanoodle ) on Jan 2, 2017 at 8:32am PST
